TopicTitle: [0.90WIP] Procedural Parts - Parts the way you want 'em 0.9.21, Dec 19

Articles.Content: Looks like I need to fix that.
Kerbals are eating WAY TOOOOOOO many snacks while in orbit......
Is this broke with 0.90?

Is this broke with 0.90?

Probably. Try it and find out! It'll probably pop up with something saying it's incompatible, but it might still work fine. Let us know, and I'll poke NK to sort it out. Will probably be of lower priority than RSS/RO and their associated mods though.
I fear strongly this will need a lot of work, due to the editor changes.
Nah, doesn't work here, all the procedural parts have the default Tiles texture, and can't be right clicked.

Great mod, I use it all the time. Still prefer stock for rocket bodies due to higher geometry detail.

It really needs a skirt for SRB. Doesn't look good when you have heavy SRB with big nozzle.
I really hope this gets updated soon, only came across this great mod last week and I've been using it ever since!

I really need this mod updated. It is one of the mods that allow me to save a lot of KSP memory by using it while deleting most of the tanks from other mods. Please update it asap, for me KSP is unplayable without it.

I've built ItMustBeACamel's version against the new KSPAPIExtensions for 0.90.0. You'll need to download the original package, then extract the ProceduralParts folder in this ontop of it. Licensing is identical (can be found at Github link). If an official release is made after this, please default to that. Additionally, KSPAVC might get annoyed at this, consider that a notice to check for a real version. I will take this down after an official update is released.

Source: https://github.com/ItMustBeACamel/ProceduralParts/tree/0.90_compatibility

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8cmb568z0y5p3gf/ProceduralParts.zip?dl=0

It works on my machine, at least.
Yep, ItMustBeACamel has done a great job fixing it. Release shortly.
Bless you!
Brilliant, thanks for the fix
Will pick this up again in the later AM-- Great work to all involved!

Yep, ItMustBeACamel has done a great job fixing it. Release shortly.

AWESOME!

For anyone interested, I just posted a pack I've been working on of textures for Procedural Parts.
Those are really cool MainSailor. my main disagreement with the procedural mods is the lack of texture fidelity.

Hi,

I'm RadarManFromTheMoon, (ItMustBeACamel on Github) and NathanKell asked me to maintain the Procedural Parts code for a while, so that he can spend more time on other things. Well, I said yes so here I am.

Just packed a new (0.90 compatible) Version for you. I can't edit the OP, but you can find it here.

Have fun!

Yay! Cooperation!

Thanks for keeping this going.
The fuel tanks have no fuel or no option to add fuel. Well at least for me anyhow.
OP updated, with many thanks to ItMustBeARadarManFromTheMoon

The fuel tanks have no fuel or no option to add fuel. Well at least for me anyhow.

Any other mods installed? Have you ensured that all of them are compatible with KSP 0.90? here you can see which informations I need to provide help.
